text:
Mineral Resources Development (Revocation) Order 2005

I make the following order under section 5(4) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

30 June 2005

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Revocation) Order 2005 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Proclamation under Mining Act 1929 revoked
    The proclamation under section 6(1)(b) of the Mining Act 1929 notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1993, No. 266 is revoked.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 20 July 2005

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
